languages.text: "Ксеновмешательство нарушило чистоту Истинной плоти, дарованной данной единице Омниссией. Ей предстоит долгая епитимья".
"Xenoblood has violated the purity of the True Flesh granted to this unit by the Omnissiah. It must serve a protracted penance."
languages.original_text: "Ксеновмешательство нарушило чистоту Истинной плоти, дарованной данной единице Омниссией. Ей предстоит долгая епитимья".

languages.text: “异形之血亵渎了欧姆尼塞亚赐予本单位的纯洁实肉，本单位必须进行长期忏悔。”
languages.original_text: "Xenoblood has violated the purity of the True Flesh granted to this unit by the Omnissiah. It must serve a protracted penance."

traits.locale_text: “异形之血亵渎了欧姆尼塞亚赐予本单位的纯洁实肉，此单位必须进行长期忏悔。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Du sang xénos a souillé la pureté de la chair véritable accordée par l'Omnimessie à l'unité. L'unité va devoir faire longtemps acte de repentance. »
languages.original_text: "Xenoblood has violated the purity of the True Flesh granted to this unit by the Omnissiah. It must serve a protracted penance."

traits.locale_text: « Du sang xénos a souillé la pureté de la chair véritable accordée par l'Omnimessie à l'unité. L'unité va devoir faire longtemps acte de repentance. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La sangre xenos ha violado la pureza de la verdadera carne que el Omnissiah otorgó a esta unidad. Es necesaria una penitencia prolongada».
languages.original_text: "Xenoblood has violated the purity of the True Flesh granted to this unit by the Omnissiah. It must serve a protracted penance."

traits.locale_text: «La sangre xenos ha violado la pureza de la verdadera carne que el Omnissiah otorgó a esta unidad. Es necesaria una penitencia prolongada».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族の血は、万機神より当ユニットに与えられた真の肉体の純粋さを侵す。償うには長い時間を費やさねばならぬ」
languages.original_text: "Xenoblood has violated the purity of the True Flesh granted to this unit by the Omnissiah. It must serve a protracted penance."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の血は、万機神より当ユニットに与えられた真の肉体の純粋さを侵す。償うには長い時間を費やさねばならぬ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Xenoblut hat die Reinheit des Wahren Fleisches besudelt, das der Omnissiah dieser Einheit gewährt hat. Sie muss eine langwierige Büßungsprozedur durchlaufen."
languages.original_text: "Xenoblood has violated the purity of the True Flesh granted to this unit by the Omnissiah. It must serve a protracted penance."

traits.locale_text: "Xenoblut hat die Reinheit des Wahren Fleisches besudelt, das der Omnissiah dieser Einheit gewährt hat. Sie muss eine langwierige Büßungsprozedur durchlaufen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Xenoblood has violated the purity of the True Flesh granted to this unit by the Omnissiah. It must serve a protracted penance."

languages.text: "Zenokanı, bu birime Hermesih tarafından bahşedilen Salt Suret'in saflığına leke sürdü. Uzun süreli ceza verilmesi gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "Xenoblood has violated the purity of the True Flesh granted to this unit by the Omnissiah. It must serve a protracted penance."

traits.locale_text: "Zenokanı, bu birime Hermesih tarafından verilen Salt Suret'in saflığına leke sürdü. Uzun süreli bir yaptırım uygulamamı gerektiriyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
